entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the evening. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
